alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern New Castle, northwestern Salem and southwestern Delaware Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Hockessin, or 7 miles west of Wilmington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported pea size hail in Hockessin. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Carneys Point, Elsmere, Penns Grove, Newport, Arden, Talleyville, Elam, Pike Creek, Chelsea, Ashland, Greenville, Hockessin, Stanton, North Star, Chester Heights, Marcus Hook, Trainer, Bellefonte and Ardentown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 12 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 4 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
